source.class:
* Cluster holding a set of {@link Clusterable} points.
* the type of points that can be clustered $Id: Cluster.java 1461871 2013-03-27 22:01:25Z tn $ 2.0 As of 3.2 (to be removed in 4.0), * use {@link org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.Cluster} instead
* Serializable version identifier.
* The points contained in this cluster.
<declaration type="List" name="points" />
* Center of the cluster.
* Build a cluster centered at a specified point. center the point which is to be the center of this cluster
* Add a point to this cluster. point point to add
* Get the points contained in the cluster. points contained in the cluster
<method type="List" name="getPoints" startLine="65" endLine="67" />
* Get the point chosen to be the center of this cluster. chosen cluster center
